execution_quality: The command execution failed with exit code 137 (likely out-of-memory or terminated), indicating the background task did not complete successfully.
work_category: Background system command execution to check TPM device availability on the user's machine.
summary: The agent attempted to execute a background command to check TPM device status but the command failed with exit code 137. This prevented gathering the necessary information to answer the user's earlier technical questions about TPM capabilities.
follow_up_pattern: User received a failure notification and would need to either retry or investigate the root cause of the TPM check failure.
